data: Mr. Craven Black | Mrs. Craven Black | Mrs. Artress | Neva
Mr. and Mrs. Craven Black, summoning the indispensable Mrs. Artress to a private conference, passed some hours in their own room in anxious deliberation upon their future course in regard to Neva.

Neva's choice
A sequel to "Neva's three lovers"
